attributes.title: Coastline -- U.S.
attributes.short-description: The line where shore and water meet. Although the terminology of coasts and shores is rather confused, shoreline and coastline are generally used as synonyms. (IHO Dictionary, S-32, 5th Edition, 858,4695) Distinction: canal bank; lake shore; river bank; shoreline construction;
attributes.subtitle: USACE Transportation Water
